channel.title: Request: More lighting sources (with sample pictures)
channel.description:
Due to the game's limited types of lighting sources and all being too large, it'd be very nice if we have more options for interior and exterior lighting designs. It's impossible to do indirect lighting designs or light stripes and even though some mod contains a 1m wall with lights, it doesn't reflect the actual light on other surfaces so that can't be counted as a lighting source because it doesn't light up that space.
- Downlight, lamps, ceiling, wall, floor, or light stripes for designing indirect lightings
